title: (x) Children style casual sans caps - Comicraft BellyLaugh {Florian}
content:
I need help identifying this typeface or finding something similar. Any suggestions? Thank you!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131102110029im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture7_6538.jpg)
author: hsu81

comments.content:
Hi Marcelo,  
it might be [Comicraft BellyLaugh](http://web.archive.org/web/20131102110029/http:/www.comicbookfonts.com/fonts/FX/catalog.html?item=fonts:fx116&sid=0001gCyiRXMygsg7X06P4R2).  
F
